name: ticket-enhancer
description: Enhance Linear tickets by cross-referencing context from Notion, Slack, Sentry, Granola, and more

scripts.enhance: export $(grep -v '^#' .env | grep -v '^$' | xargs) && npx tsx src/enhance.ts
scripts.batch: export $(grep -v '^#' .env | grep -v '^$' | xargs) && npx tsx src/batch.ts
scripts.serve: export $(grep -v '^#' .env | grep -v '^$' | xargs) && npx tsx src/server.ts
